---
name: planning-status
interactive: true
description: Collects or updates the status for a feature, subtask, or backlog item. Use this skill to prompt for and validate status as part of planning workflows. Supports interactive mode for user input.
---

argument-hint:
/status: |
Parameters: none
Action: Prompt the user to select or update the status (not started, in progress, complete, archived), validate selection, and return the value.
Example: /status
